v8:item.v8:content: Sales return operation doesn't assume the physical goods movement, thus there are no COGS entries. Use Goods return document additionally. AR adjustments and Discount allowed operations are equal, but since the different nature of their reason, they are split in two.
The account to record the adjusted amount to. Usually a contra-revenue account.
Credited transaction tab serves just to keep link between Credit note and the documents caused its issuance, as required by legislation. You can fill it in, or not.
Use this tab to allocate adjusted amount to accounts receivable or for advance recognition.
